column5: It appears our banner software has crapped out. I honestly cannot find the issue. I'm hoping it is on the server side somewhere, cause all looks good from here. If we can't find the issue, we do have a total back-up and a new system already on the server ( lucky we were playing with new software, huh?). If this isn't on the server (hosting issue) we'll have it back online next week cause everyone is going to be gone for the weekend. It will take alot of time and coffee to transfer the accounts if we have to, but we will get it done.
"Progress" just another word for a lot of work LOL.
What do you mean everyone will be gone,whos going to keep things sane around here.LOL
when the cat is away...  party on guys.. the inmates will be running the asylum

Rick, can you send me the link, address, whatever ... that I can go to for the purchase of banner advertising, or specific instructions on how to buy advertising on the site.  When you get back of course.  Cheers,  Jen
Jen here ya go... contact me.. but the details are here:  http://www.ontariofishing.net/banneradvertising.html  We will get it fixed up in a jiffy.
